answers.answer: if it runs in your family then it might be inevitable ... and some people get the GD while pregnant it just happens but it can easily be controlled by diet if its not too serious. im hypoglycemic even before pregnancy and I control it with my diet and i dont have to take insulin or pills or anything.. GOODLUCK sweetie I hope it ends up being an error
Yeah it does that's why I make sure to get screened for it...every 3 or so months at work.....does it pass when pregnancy is over???
My cousin had gd with her son then after she gave birth it went away
I've heard about a lot of people failing the first test and then passing the 3 hour test.

question: .so my doctors office called me a week later to tell me that failed my glucose test...I'm so bumed :/....so much for no news is good news....I really thought everything was fine now I have to go in tomorrow to do the 3hour test...I'm in tears because I just don't want to fail it...I've never had a problem with diabetes...because I also get screened for it....ugh this *****
